price: او كه پر تاسي د الله فضل او رحمت نه وى (نو رسوا شوي به وئ)، او دا چې الله ښه توبه قبلوونكى حكمت والا دى.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha tawwābun ḥakīmun
